Instance Method# tryReduce(_:_:)

SwiftCombineiOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func tryReduce<T>(
    _ initialResult: T,
    _ nextPartialResult: (T, Result<Success, Failure>.Publisher.Output) throws -> T
) -> Result<T, any Error>.Publisher
```

Available when `Failure` conforms to `Error`.
